author: Staff Reporter
text:
Nine persons were injured when the van they were travelling in rammed a roadside tree and overturned near Kanyakumari on Thursday morning.

According to police, a group of three families were proceeding from Karungal to Kanyakumari on a sightseeing trip when the accident occurred. Balachandran (58) of Palavakkam in Chennai, his family members and relatives came to Karungal to attend a marriage.

After attending the function, they hired a van for a sightseeing trip to Kanyakumari. When the van approached a curve in Achamangalam in Kottaram, the driver lost control of the vehicle and it rammed the tree and overturned.

Eight persons, including women and the van driver, were admitted to Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital. Their condition is said to be stable. Kanyakumari police are investigating.
title: Nine injured as van rams tree, overturns
